dcterms:creator: Alex Krizhevsky
dcterms:description: A dataset consisting of 60,000 32x32 color images in 10 different classes, with 6,000 images per class, commonly used for training machine learning models.
dcterms:title: CIFAR10

dcterms:creator: Alex Krizhevsky
dcterms:description: A dataset consisting of 60,000 32x32 color images in 100 different classes, with 600 images per class, used for evaluating machine learning algorithms.
dcterms:title: CIFAR100

dcterms:creator: Alex Krizhevsky
dcterms:description: A dataset of handwritten digits consisting of 60,000 training images and 10,000 testing images, widely used for benchmarking machine learning algorithms.
dcterms:title: MNIST

dcterms:creator: Han Xiao
Kashif Rasul
Roland Vollgraf
dcterms:description: A dataset consisting of 70,000 grayscale images of clothing items, intended as a drop-in replacement for the MNIST dataset for benchmarking machine learning algorithms.
dcterms:title: FASHION_MNIST
